summary: Premium Features (Öne Çıkan/Featured and Acil/Urgent) tested successfully. All 9 requested features are working correctly. Backend API properly stores and returns is_featured and is_urgent flags. Frontend Brand Dashboard shows premium toggles with correct visual feedback (yellow/red borders). HomeFeed displays badges on job cards and featured jobs appear at top of listings.
seed_data_creation: Created test job 'TEST_Premium_Job_UI_Test' with both is_featured=true and is_urgent=true
context_for_next_testing_agent: Premium features fully functional. Key data-testid attributes: 'featured-toggle', 'urgent-toggle', 'create-job-btn', 'create-job-modal', 'submit-job-btn'. Featured toggle shows yellow border when selected, urgent toggle shows red border. Job cards display 'Öne Çıkan' (yellow) and 'Acil' (red) badges. Featured jobs sorted to top of listings.

brand_create_job_with_featured.details: Brand can create job with 'Öne Çıkan İlan' (Featured) option enabled via data-testid='featured-toggle'

brand_create_job_with_urgent.details: Brand can create job with 'Acil İlan' (Urgent) option enabled via data-testid='urgent-toggle'

brand_enable_both_premium_options.details: Brand can enable both premium options together - tested with TEST_Premium_Job_UI_Test job

premium_toggle_visual_feedback.details: Featured toggle shows yellow border (border-yellow-500) when selected, Urgent toggle shows red border (border-red-500) when selected

featured_jobs_in_homefeed.details: Jobs with is_featured=true appear in job listings. Note: 'Öne Çıkan İlanlar' section only appears when recommendations API returns jobs (requires influencer profile with specialties)

featured_badge_on_job_cards.details: Featured jobs show 'Öne Çıkan' badge with yellow styling and lightning icon on job cards

urgent_badge_on_job_cards.details: Urgent jobs show 'Acil' badge with red styling and clock icon on job cards

featured_jobs_sorted_to_top.details: Featured jobs appear at the top of job listings due to sorting logic in filteredAndSortedJobs

brand_dashboard_premium_badges.details: Brand dashboard shows 'ÖNE ÇIKAN' and 'ACİL' badges on their job cards with correct styling
